title: React Portfolio Website
description: Modern portfolio website built with React and Next.js featuring responsive design and interactive animations.
content:
# React Portfolio Website

A modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing my work as a web developer. Built with the latest technologies and best practices.

## Features

- Responsive design
- Dark/light theme toggle
- Smooth animations
- SEO optimized
- Performance optimized

## Technologies Used

- React 18
- Next.js 13
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Framer Motion

seo.title: React Portfolio Website - Modern Web Development
seo.description: Professional portfolio website built with React, Next.js, and TypeScript. Featuring responsive design and interactive animations.

title: Music Video Production - Artist Collaboration
description: Creative music video production featuring advanced visual effects and cinematography for emerging artist.

videos.title: Music Video - Full Version
videos.description: Complete music video with visual effects

content:
# Music Video Production

Collaborated with emerging artist to create a visually stunning music video that combines storytelling with cutting-edge visual effects.

## Project Highlights

- 3-day production schedule
- 5 unique locations
- Advanced color grading
- Custom visual effects
- Motion graphics integration

## Technical Details

- Shot on RED Dragon 6K
- Edited in Adobe Premiere Pro
- VFX created in After Effects
- Color graded in DaVinci Resolve

seo.title: Music Video Production - Creative Visual Effects
seo.description: Professional music video production featuring advanced visual effects, cinematography, and post-production work.

title: Brand Identity Design - Tech Startup
description: Complete brand identity design including logo, color palette, typography, and brand guidelines for innovative tech startup.
content:
# Brand Identity Design

Created a comprehensive brand identity for an innovative tech startup, establishing their visual presence across all touchpoints.

## Deliverables

- Primary and secondary logos
- Color palette and guidelines
- Typography system
- Business card design
- Letterhead and envelope
- Social media templates
- Brand guidelines document

## Design Process

1. Brand strategy workshop
2. Market research and analysis
3. Concept development
4. Design iteration
5. Brand guidelines creation
6. Implementation support

seo.title: Brand Identity Design - Tech Startup Branding
seo.description: Professional brand identity design including logo, color palette, and comprehensive brand guidelines for tech startup.
